name: Fairfield Inn and Suites Key West

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: Two pluses and two minuses. The pluses: 1) the hotel room was very clean, and I'm a pretty picky person when it comes to this area of a hotel stay; 2) free breakfast by the pool. The minuses: 1) of the two room keys I received, only one worked, and not all the time. So each time I had to go into my room, I had to go back and forth between keys four or five times before the door would open; 2) the wi-fi access was quite slow and intermittently at best.
reviews.title: Good, but not excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Key West hotels run pretty expensive, so though this hotel was a little pricey for the size of the room, it was overall a good deal on the island.
reviews.title: No thrills, but good Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall -- This is a pleasant hotel with decent accommodations, but nothing spectacular.
reviews.title: Pleasant, but not highly handicap accessible.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service -- I travel with a group of 5 sales reps. on an incentive business trip to the Fairfield Inn at Key West. We received decent service, expecially from the two UK customer service reps. that checked us in. The taxi service that picked us up and dropped us off to and from Duvall street was slow, and I thought the hotel could have done a better job with this. All in all the service was quite nice.
reviews.title: Knowledgeable, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Value -- For the location, and on Key West this was the best value. We got a decent rate and were able to do all the activities we wanted to. You can spend way more and stay closer to Duvall Street, but for the money I'm not sure if it is worth it.
reviews.title: Good....but you might want to avoid the small standard rooms.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In Key West primarily to take a side trip to the Dry Tortugas, we tried the Fairfield Inn and Suites; we sought reasonably priced accomodation convenient to the early morning (7:15 AM) check in time for the ferry to the National Park. In that regard, the Fairfield Inn & Suites couldn't have been much better unless we'd sprung for much more expensive accomodation within walking distance of the "Historic Marina". At about 7:00 AM, it took us only 7 minutes to drive to a parking garage convenient to the ferry office! (We found Dry Tortugas one of the most unusual National Parks we've ever visited, incidentally, and, for us, worth the expensive ferry trip of over two hour each way!)
reviews.title: A Key West place to consider, but with flaws.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: Back at the Fairfield Inn, our room was clean and comfortable, and the hotel surrounds an attractive pool. The breakfast room is adjacent, so one can enjoy the included breakfast in pleasant surroundings pool-side.
reviews.title: A Benchmark for Customer Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: That breakfast, though, is not one of the Fairfield Inn's better features. It's the typical Fairfield Inn breakfast, which we find inferior to it's main mid-range competitors, Holiday Inn Express and Hampton Inns. Fairfield Inns "feature" Jimmy Dean breakfast sandwiches, ready-to-microwave little bundles of egg, salt and saturated fats. Esthetics apart, at least at the competition one can choose what to have with one's eggs, leaving out or consuming whatever (breakfast meat, cheese, toast, etc.,) one chooses, while Jimmy packages them all together!
reviews.title: Terrific Customer Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also unlike those other chains, which offer 24 hour hot beverages in the lobby, this Fairfield Inn offers only very limited hours for beverages in the lobby. That seemed to us to symbolize a certain cheapness of the operation.
reviews.title: Nicest Fairfield Inn.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While the Fairfield Inn does have one elevator, it is quite far from many of the rooms. (Of course it's still welcome compared to many properties that have none!) The Fairfield Inn has free (unsecured) WiFi, which worked well during our stay; but, if important to you, note that no wired (and more secure) broadband is available.
reviews.title: Not meeting customer expectations of Fairfield Inns

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: far from duval street and no free shuttle despite the marriot courtyard up the road providing one. pool is nice and breakfaast assortment was better than anticipated. i suspect we were in the older part of the hotel with a double room. it was clean but window opened to walkway so no privacy and room was tiny, no desk etc. we were originally going to stay 2 nights but at $359/night, no way. we were abe to get a special rate at the casa marina resort for $379/night with a $100 credit for resort acgtivities etc and it included a complete breakfast buffet. Maybe a studio suite at this hotel could barey justify their price but certainly not a room on par with a Days Inn
reviews.title: way overpriced

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012
reviews.text: Nice and clean hotel with nice pool area.
reviews.title: Nice - but over prized

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But ..
reviews.title: Sleep, Eat, Go!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At 358 a night you would expect prime location.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was barely average with limited sortiment taken the prize in consideration
reviews.title: Friendly helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012
reviews.text: Overall found this hotel very clean and well maintained. We posted the magnet used to indicate no required maid service daily but upon our return each evening our room had been made up anyways. Not really a comlaint, just found it odd. We enjoyed the close proximity to all the local spots in town from this location. Front desk service was excellent. Upon our arrival the first night, the female clerk was very accommodating in allowing us to park our trailer and motorcycle in one spot and our truck adjacent. This has been an issue in the past when we have trailered our bike on other trips. Lots of places to rent bicycles and mopeds for touring town. We would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Key West!
reviews.title: Overall a very nice hotel close to Duvall Street attractions and restraints. Beautiful pool area and front staff very accoumadat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The entire staff was very friendly, welcoming, helpful !
reviews.title: Excellent customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice pool. Good breakfast ! Clean room !
reviews.title: Much better than that expensive resort.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel is conveniently located !
reviews.title: Very pleasant spring break experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Will recommend this hotel !
reviews.title: Great Stay!

aka: Fairfield Inn And Suites Key West Hotel Key West
description: Marriott's signature style and service meet island-style living in a tropical atmosphere at the Marriot, Fairfield Inn & Suites- Key West. Boasting high quality island accomodations at an incredible value, our Key West hotel is located just minutes away from beaches, restaurants, shopping, entertainment and everything else you could possibly want to do on our 8 square mile island paradise. Featuring a beautiful 72,000 gallon free formed pool, Complimentary Breakfast Buffet served poolside, Complimentary Business Center with printers, Free Wifi, On-site Scooter, Bicycle and Electric Car rental. All guest rooms offer a New LCD Flat Screen TV, Microwave & Refrigerator.
